material: Cast iron core with neoprene/vinyl coating
usage: Resistance training for toning and sculpting arms, shoulders, and back; suitable for fitness classes or at-home workouts
key_features: Hexagonal shape for easy stacking and roll-free use
Easy-grip coating for a secure hold
ai_description: A pair of blue hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth, matte neoprene coating. Each dumbbell has the brand 'KAKSS' and weight '2 KG' printed in white on the hexagon-shaped ends. The compact, roll-free design features a color-coded coating over a solid cast-iron core, providing a comfortable, non-slip grip. The product is presented as new, with a clean, professional appearance suitable for various fitness environments.
target_audience: Individuals seeking home or gym fitness equipment for strength training
